listing.listing_description:
Escape to this elegant sanctuary in the heart of upscale Seminyak, close to both the beach and a bustling dining and shopping scene, you’ll experience the best of both worlds, making this one of our top villas in Bali. A top tropical holiday destination, the island of Bali offers a welcoming atmosphere, unique culture and stunning beaches.

This home offers plenty of space to unwind, whether you want to soak in the sun on a cushioned lounger by the T-shaped swimming pool, relax in the shade on a rattan sofa on the timber deck, or wander through the garden courtyard. There’s also a media room that opens up to the pool deck, complete with a satellite television, movie box and plush sofas for evening enjoyment. Included in your stay are the services of two butlers, housekeepers, and an in-house chef.

The main pavilion’s downstairs lounge opens up to the back terrace and features terrazzo flooring and elegant rattan furnishings in neutral colors with pops of color. Upstairs is a second television lounge with a balcony that overlooks the pool area. In the kitchen and dining pavilion you’ll find premium appliances as well as a teak bar for cocktails. Enjoy meals in the open-air dining area, or dine alfresco at the table on the pool deck.

Up to eight adults plus two children can comfortably stay in this villa’s four bedrooms. All suites include spacious en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, while three of the rooms boast king size beds (the remaining suite’s twin beds are ideal for children).

As a guest here you’ll be only 0.5 km away from the popular Seminyak Beach, and the neighborhood’s high-end boutiques, restaurants and bustling nightlife options are also close by.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Watch the days unfold across Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables from Views on Edinburgh. Built with living areas on the top floor, this modern retreat is designed to make the most of its views over some of New Zealand’s most spectacular scenery. No matter what time of year you visit, its proximity to central Queenstown puts you within easy reach of a range of activities, from golf to skiing.

 

On sunny days, watch boats ply the lake from a lounger on the terrace, then serve lunch from the barbecue at the al-fresco table. On cooler evenings, pour a glass of local wine to sip as you soak in the outdoor hot tub or reconnect with friends and family indoors around the ping-pong table, satellite TV and integrated sound system.

 

A glass wall brings the dramatic sight of the lake and mountains into the open-concept living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen. A nearly all-white color scheme makes the space feel that much larger, and modern furnishings from a swing chair to industrial stools are stylish yet inviting places to perch.

 

This luxury property has 3 bedrooms with king beds, private en-suite bathrooms and lake views, including a top-floor master suite with its own honeymoon-suite-worthy balcony facing the water. The fourth bedroom has two twin beds and access to a hall bathroom, along with its own views of the lake and mountains.

 

A stay at this vacation rental could be a quiet week of relaxation or an adventure holiday—it’s up to you. Views on Edinburgh is less than a 10-minute drive from the shops and restaurants of downtown Queenstown and tranquil Queenstown Gardens on the waterfront, as well as more thrilling attractions like Skyline Queenstown, where you can ride a gondola up the mountain and luge back down.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you’ve dreamed of having your own house on the Big Island, indulge your fantasies at Mauna Lani Kamilo House 333. This beautiful four-bedroom family home offers more than 3,000 square feet of living space and an incredible location in the gated Kamilo community at Mauna Lani Resort. Not only do guests have the amenities of a private house, they’re also welcome at the shared community and resort facilities.

The shared amenities include pools, hot tubs, a barbecue area and a fitness center at Kamilo, and the option to use the golf club, fitness center, spa and tennis courts at Mauna Lani Resort. Kamilo House 333 also has its own lanai facing the golf course, with shaded and sunny lounge areas, a pool and hot tub, and an al-fresco dining area with a barbecue.

Open the home’s living spaces to the lanai with the glass pocket doors, letting the Hawaiian breezes waft over the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. The space is comfortable and well appointed, from the plush sectional in front of the TV to the soft leather chairs around the pedestal dining table. The kitchen features stunning stone countertops as well as a convenient breakfast bar.

This luxury vacation rental has three bedrooms in the main house and one in a separate guest suite; all four have ensuite bathrooms. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite facing the golf course and Kohala Mountains, and one bedroom with a queen bed. Use the king bedroom in the ohana, or guest suite, as a quiet space for in-laws or even a honeymoon-style retreat. Luxurious organic Malie bath products are supplied throughout the home as well.

From beaches and entertainment to shopping and dining, you’ll find that everything you want—and need—is close to Kamilo House 333. There are four beaches within two miles, from Holoholokai and its striking lava formations and petroglyphs to Pauoa Bay and its calm waters and golden sand. The nearby Shops at Mauna Lani have everything from ready-made meals to water sports equipment and one-of-a-kind souvenirs of your Big Island holiday.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Set amongst the foothills of The Remarkables, Kahua Villa enjoys sweeping mountain views from its four-bedroom, modern farmhouse atmosphere. Located in Jack’s Point, Kahua offers its guests quick and easy access to the bustling city of Queenstown, while celebrating the privacy of its rural environment. Nearby, you’ll find Jack’s Point Golf Course. And, if you’re in New Zealand to ski, The Remarkables and Coronet Peak are both within a half hour’s drive. If you appreciate the marriage between country living and modern luxury, Kahua Villa is the perfect home base for your next Luxury Retreat.

Just like its mountainous surroundings, Kahua Villa enjoys an airy-atmosphere, peaked ceilings, and soaring views. The living room stretches back the entire depth of the villa, flowing into the formal dining space, and kitchen. With floor-to-ceiling windows, a grand fireplace, and leather sofas, you’re sure to feel the inviting warmth of a classic ski chalet, yet Kahua’s stylish-contemporary spin adds a luxurious elegance to the equation. Connecting the television lounge and an extensive wine collection, you’ll find a pair of beautiful sliding barn doors. Moving on, Kahua’s terrace has the perfect setting for an alfresco dinner, with The Remarkables providing an unbeatable background.

Kahua Villa comes with a fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and lots more. All four bedrooms feature king or split-king sized beds. The Master Bedroom enjoys a walk-in closet and its own private terrace with outdoor furniture. And, the fourth bedroom is located in a separate unit with an en-suite bathroom and kitchenette, making it easy for guests who desire a little extra privacy.

Aside from skiing and golf, sailing is a great way to get out and have fun while enjoying the beautiful environment of Queenstown, and Wakatipu Yacht Club is the perfect place to inquire about lessons, tours, and rentals. If there’s a thrill seeker in your group, New Zealand is well-known as a haven for adventure tourists, with everything from jet boating to canyon swinging, skydiving, rock climbing, and everything in between. If you’re in the mood for exciting city life, Queenstown is just twenty minutes from home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This breathtaking villa is situated in the Tabanan Regency of southwestern Bali, steps from Pasut Beach. A visionary architectural masterpiece, the home consists of five elliptical forms fused into a cloud-like structure, with spacious living and dining areas and three deluxe bedroom suites. The villa is perched on a secure estate with a private swimming pool, beautiful lawns, and views of the Indian Ocean. Each of the bedrooms features a king bed and ensuite bathroom, ideal for multiple couples, destination wedding guests, or a family. Your vacation rental includes complimentary manager, butler, and housekeeping services, with multiple premium options available.

The lush estate offers an enchanting venue for special occasions or serene relaxation. The swimming pool echoes the shape of the home's front facade, with ample room to play and bathe. Elegant lounge chairs arrayed on the terrace beckon you into the exquisite light, while the sprawling lawns extend toward coastal rice paddies and the vast ocean.

The interiors feature a superb open kitchen flanked by a living room and dining room. Large glass walls open to the pool, infusing the home with an alfresco ambiance. Luminous white surfaces accentuate the artful décor of teak, onyx, petrified wood, and exposed rock. The sleek kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a lovely marble breakfast bar. The lounge area features superb furnishings, a high-end TV, and an elegant chess table, while the gorgeous dining table seats twelve beneath flower-like lamps.

A floating staircase forms the threshold into the dining room and ascends to the master suite: the apex of the home. The suite features a lovely in-room tub in addition to an ensuite bathroom with rain shower. The two guest suites are on the garden level, facing away from the pool. Each features an ensuite bathroom with rain shower opening to a stone tub on a private patio. Like the living areas, the bedrooms are furnished with a minimalist elegance, including beautiful, naturalistic objects and original artwork.

From this private retreat at Pasut Beach, you're just short drive to Abian Kapas Beach and less than twenty kilometers to Tanah Lot Temple and Nirwana Bali Golf Club. The famed beaches and nightlife at Seminyak are about thirty kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find perfectly laid-back luxury at Villa Mannao. Set in a residential neighborhood with views of the Kerobokan rice fields, this expansive Bali vacation rental offers both a tranquil ambience and a location close to the beaches and attractions of Seminyak and Canggu. Its attentive staff will accommodate your needs, and its eight suite-style bedrooms can accommodate up to sixteen friends or extended family on holiday together.

Your stay at the villa begins with an airport transfer upon arrival and includes the services of a housekeeper, cook, security and a gardener. Make the most of the tropical weather with two pools, and loungers in the sun and the shade of a bale, heating up the barbecue as the sun sinks toward the horizon. For evening entertainment, there’s a satellite TV, sound system, Wi-Fi and bar.

Like many traditional Balinese estates, Villa Mannao is laid out over a series of pavilions set in a lush garden. At the heart of the property, you’ll find two open-sided living spaces that let in both the views and the warm breezes, which you can enjoy from a spot on one of the contemporary sofas or around a dining table that seats eighteen. Though cook service is included, the villa does have a fully equipped kitchen.

The eight bedrooms at Villa Mannao are spread out between four separate buildings. Each one has a private en-suite bathroom and an al-fresco shower or bathtub. There are seven honeymoon-worthy suites with king beds, and one bedroom with two twin bunk beds that’s perfect for younger guests.

Despite the villa’s serene setting, it’s only a 10-minute drive from popular beaches such as picturesque Batubelig and the relatively secluded Petitenget, as well as the attractions of Seminyak and Canggu. Find the perfect souvenir or satisfying snack in the shops and restaurants at Seminyak Square, seek thrills at the Finns Recreation Club and Waterbom Bali or spend a memorable night out in Kuta.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Keep up with your active lifestyle at this sporty villa by the beach in Portsea, Australia. Workout in the state of the art home gym. Challenge a friend to a ping pong match. Or, get outside for a little tennis while the kids bounce on the in-ground trampoline. After cooling off in the pool, head out for a round at St. Andrews Beach Golf Course or sign-up for a surfing lesson at Portsea Beach. 

After a dinner beside the imposing concrete fireplace in the open concept kitchen, let the party flow to the lounge. Before you leave, grab a bottle from the wine fridge and enjoy the modern-chic atmosphere. Later in the night, mix a few tropical cocktails behind the poolside bar on the terrace and have a drink while you relax in the hot tub. 

If you’re in for the evening, fire up the barbecue in case a late-night snack is in order. If you’ve got a competitive spirit, start a game of 21 on the basketball court, see if you can beat the high score on the arcade games, or play a round of croquet on the lawn. When you’re ready to call it, retreat to the master ensuite’s spa-like rain shower and melt any lingering stress away before bed. 

Grab your camera and set out for an adventure on the trails of Point Nepean National Park. Snap a few pics from the top of the London Bridge Lookout and see if you can catch your dinner at the fishing dock on Sorrento Pier. For a little family fun, check out Enchanted Adventure Park. And, for a night on the town with that special someone, the bustling city of Melbourne is just an hour from home. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This contemporary home boasts some of the best unobstructed ocean views of all our Bali luxury rentals, and offers plenty of privacy. A top tropical destination, the island of Bali offers a warm and welcoming culture as well as a mix of fantastic beaches and varied landscapes, ready for exploring.

Let all the stresses of everyday life melt away as you relax on a plush chaises loungers on the villa’s terrace and garden. They surround a 12-metre swimming pool and are framed by a tall stonewall, ensuring you’ll experience optimal privacy. Later, enjoy a glass of wine and magnificent ocean views from the outdoor lounge area located on the upper level of the home. As added amenities, the villa is fully staffed with a chef, butler and housekeeper, so you won’t need to lift a finger.

The interior of the villa is contemporary and finished throughout with marble flooring, vaulted ceilings, neutral tones and high-end furnishings. The main living area includes an open-concept design and opens up to the gardens and pool via a large sliding door. The dining area features a wooden table with seating for 12 where you can enjoy a lovely meal prepared in the fully equipped kitchen.

Sleeping up to 10 guests, the villa boasts five well-appointed king size bedrooms featuring either hardwood or marble flooring. Two of the suites are located on the lower level with glass doors walking out to the terrace. The remaining three bedrooms are located on the upper level, two of which include master bedrooms with seating areas. All the rooms include a private en-suite, air conditioning and television.

When you’re ready to step away from the villa, Batubelig Beach, well known for surfing, is just around the corner and a five-minute walk brings you to an assortment of restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Anandita means ‘bringer of happiness’ in the ancient language of Sanskrit, and this beachside haven located in fabulous Lombok is sure to bring its fortunate guests just that. A series of single-story living and sleeping pavilions leisurely spread throughout an enormous plot of lush green lawns planted with towering coconut palms compose this delightful tropical retreat. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve in this magical area of Indonesia!

Guests will be spoiled for choice when it comes to planning their days. Will it be a swim in the spectacular pool complete with waterfall feature and Jacuzzi or beachcombing and kayaking on beautiful Sira Beach. Or perhaps an energetic game of soccer or volleyball? Those seeking more languid pursuits can plug in their iPods and chill out with some choice tunes, watch a movie on the large screen satellite television with DVD player or socialize over a game of billiards in the living pavilion.

The kitchen at Anandita is cleverly divided for either guest or staff use. The villa’s cook is expertly skilled at preparing a wide range of delicious local and international dishes – anything from formal dinners in the dining pavilion, to a romantic supper beside the beach, to a casual poolside barbecue. The interiors are somehow minimalistic, yet regal – an ideal environment for meditation and rejuvenation. The open plan concept as well as high vaulted ceilings keep the feelings airy and breezy throughout the gorgeous pavilions.

Each of the four en-suite bedrooms is housed in a private pavilion in the gardens. King size beds and convertible daybeds make these rooms very family-friendly. All of the suites feature air conditioning, media units and stunning beach views. Fine linens and top quality beddings provide soothing nights of well deserved rest.

As well as taking care of Anandita itself, a team of friendly, thoughtful staff will happily entertain guests of all ages, creating coconut leaf toys and decorations with the children, making up numbers for volleyball games, or turning tour guide for those who would like to explore further afield – made even easier courtesy of the services of a car and driver included with your reservation. Bask in the weather, water, good food and good people this year in lovely Indonesia!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This beautiful three-bedroom home is perched on a hill in Queenstown overlooking sublime, panoramic vistas of Lake Wakatipu and the Remarkables mountains of New Zealand's South Island. Built of fine wood in a classic alpine style, the home features luminous interiors, ample outdoor areas, and high-end amenities for cooking and entertainment. Three bedrooms sleep four guests, providing an ideal haven for families and small groups.

The middle floor of this three-level home features an open-plan living area and lovely deck. Kindle a fire and enjoy a fine New Zealand wine in the lounge, and gather around the eight-person dining table for a delicious home-cooked feast. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar, and the deck includes an alfresco table with spectacular views of the lake and peaks.

The master suite is on the top floor of the house while the guest rooms are on the bottom floor. Each bedrooms features a king bed (one is a king-split) and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The master suite enjoys its own fireplace and a jetted tub in its bathroom. The twin bedroom opens to a furnished terrace, and all three rooms enjoy stunning lake and mountain views.

The villa's ideal location gives you lakeside serenity and easy access to the cultural, natural, and sporting treasures of Queensland and the surrounding mountains. You're just a kilometer from downtown and Skycity Casino, and less than two kilometers from Queenstown Gardens. Golfers are minutes from Remarkable Golf Tours and an easy drive to Queenstown Golf Course, while the ski slopes of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables Ski Area are both in easy reach. With Queenstown Airport in easy reach, this vacation rental a great choice for destination wedding guests or easy weekend getaways.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience premium accommodation that lives and breathes ancient island traditions at this unique Lombok property. Beneath thatched longhouses, guests can experience open plan living spaces, polished luxury and finely catered services. Soaring ceilings, veiled four poster beds and a charming poolside ambience all cater to guest needs, while island attractions and pristine beaches are all nearby.

Set underneath swaying palm trees, Sira Beach House is a far cry from the traditional four walls of the holiday villa. This villa instead prizes indigineous design, open spaces combined with next-level comfort, while a combination of stone, woven wood and carved Indonesian art make up the stimulating layout. Guests will awaken to the soft light and rich fabrics of royally-style bedrooms, before taking up a seat on the poolside recliners amidst glittering Lombak sunshine. Guests can congregate around the laid-back couches and luxurious easy chairs, before tasting a a freshly cooked and locally-sourced dinner at the lengthy, darkwood dining table.

From Sira Beach House, guests have enviable access to some of the finest beaches on the entire island, complete with white sands and excellent surfing spots. Guests are just a few kilometers from the ferry port for the famous Gilli islands, a wonderfully motor-free archipelago where guests can experience unspoilt nature, first-class scuba diving in vibrant tropical waters, and peaceful yoga and meditation retreats, not to mention a range of excellent restaurants and eateries.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This enchanting home in southern Bali is part of Nyaman Villas, an exclusive community of six private residences located within walking distance of Seminyak Square. Designed by esteemed architect Stephan Remini, these villas balance serene privacy, traditional Balinese ambiance, and high-end amenities for dining and relaxation—all within minutes of some of the finest beaches and nightlife in Bali. The two-bedroom villa is ideal for couples or a small family, featuring sumptuous suites, beautiful bathrooms, and ample living areas (including a private swimming pool). Your vacation rental comes with security services, a butler, and a villa manager. Private chef services (among other deluxe offerings) are also available.

Nestled amid lush tropical gardens and trees, the villa features 500 square meters of total living space. A cavernous living room forms the heart of the home, with a generous lounge, a dining table for six, and an open gourmet kitchen. Exquisite décor evokes the timeless character of Bali, at once traditional and firmly planted in the present moment. The room flows gracefully onto the terrace, creating a spacious venue for festive gatherings or tranquil relaxation. Step into the welcoming, gem-toned pool for a rejuvenating swim, and savor the sea-kissed air on lounge chairs perched beneath parasols.

The bedroom suites flank the main living area, opening directly to the pool terrace. Each room features a queen-size bed, safe, desk, TV, walk-in closet, and semi-outdoor ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, tub, and alfresco rain shower. Air conditioning ensures comfort at all times.

The villa offers a wonderful alternative to southern Bali's popular resorts, its prime location balancing the tranquility of a private home with proximity to Seminyak's famed nightlife. Walk about five minutes to the city square, or drive five minutes to Seminyak Beach or Petitenget Beach. Ngurah Rai International Airport is only twelve kilometers away, ensuring convenient access for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Water and mountain views provide a serene backdrop from the exquisite contemporary kitchen, dining space and lounge. Solid walnut timber features carry through from the kitchen to the separate media room, a lovely spot to retreat to for movie nights or the big game.

Outdoor entertaining can be enjoyed year-round in a range of well-designed alfresco spaces. An outdoor schist fireplace takes the edge off brisk nights and the lake facing hot tub with built-in speakers & an uninterrupted view can promise fabulous social moments. The house has two separate bedrooms wings. All but the prized room include a queen bed. The luxurious master bedroom comes with a king bed, walk in wardrobe, TV and an ensuite with a large bath tub facing the lake views.

The exclusive properties in the area also have use of the communal swimming pool, spa, tennis court and gym. It is a short 2.6km walk into the town centre or a 4 minute drive.

listing.listing_description:
From the Frankton Arm of Lake Wakatipu, this luxurious five bedroom villa uses floor-to-ceiling windows to deliver panoramic views of the lake, the Remarkables mountain range, and Queenstown. Within a few minute’s drive, you’ll find golf, skiing, sandy beachfront, and Queenstown’s bustling nightlife. Shimmerlake is located in the prestigious community of Kelvin Heights, about fifteen kilometers from Queenstown, making it an ideal setting for those who appreciate privacy as well as proximity.

Making the most of its lake and mountain-side location, Shimmerlake’s open concept living room stretches wide rather than deep, giving the dining area, kitchen, and fireplace lounge equal opportunity to capture the amazing scenery. Sleek architecture gives Shimmerlake a futuristic feel, while modern-retro furnishings add stylish warmth and comfort to the interior decor. A separate media room supplies guests with a more casual setting to relax and enjoy a movie night with the family. And, the master bedroom comes with an en-suite bathroom, king-sized bed, walk-in closet, and lake and mountain views.

Dining in? Shimmerlake is the perfect host for a special evening with friends and family. There’s garage parking for one, and space for three more vehicles in the driveway. Inside, the fully equipped kitchen makes meal prep a breeze, and the formal dining area has a beautiful mountain view and seating for ten. Outside, you’ll love the casual atmosphere of the alfresco dining set and barbecue. And, you’ll surely appreciate Shimmerlake’s Wi-Fi, sound system, and television.

The dramatic landscapes of New Zealand offer incredible hiking and walking trails, many of which are accessible from Shimmerlake in a matter of minutes. Jardine Park and the Franklin Recreational Reserve are both great places to start your exploration. Golf is another way to get out and enjoy the view, and Queenstown is home to a few World-class courses, like Jack’s Point. After your round, stop into Jack’s Point Restaurant for a late lunch, they have an amazing menu full of locally sourced ingredients, and breathtaking mountain views.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A fireplace crackles in the shadow of snow-capped mountains at this lodge-inspired contemporary home near Lake Wanaka. Charcoal-dark cedar cladding on the outside contrasts with the white marble countertops and pale hardwood floors inside. It’s a 6-minute drive through the lake-dotted landscape to food trucks serving up chicken and crepes and coffee shops pouring organic brews in Wanaka Town.

 Cross the lawn from the main house to an open-sided al-fresco pavilion with a sitting area tucked around a fireplace, a dining table for eight, and an outdoor kitchen with a wine fridge and gas barbecue. Watch the first stars appear over the peaks while soaking in the outdoor hot tub, or slip inside to watch the smart TV and challenge friends and family in the games room.

 Sloping rooflines and dramatic cedar panels conceal bright rooms with impressive mountain views through walls of glass. Timber ceilings get a bit of edge from massive steel beams that stretch across the open-concept living area, dining table for six, and a fully equipped kitchen with a splash of marble across its breakfast bar.

 This luxury property has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a king bed and queen bed, respectively, and share a hall bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms use hardwood floors, timber ceilings, and neutral tones for a serene feel, and sliding glass doors open to the outdoors.

 While this vacation rental feels private, it’s less than a 10-minute drive from downtown Wanaka, where you’ll find everything from casual cafes and friendly pubs to honeymoon-worthy restaurants focusing on local fare. Save a day on your holiday schedule for a day trip to Mount Aspiring National Park, where you can get up close to the glaciers and waterfalls that make New Zealand so gorgeous.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to your own quiet piece of Bali at Abaca Villa Nyoman. This stylish vacation rental outside Seminyak was designed as a tranquil retreat, with a location amid verdant rice fields and a layout that encourages laid-back indoor-outdoor living. While its five bedrooms have space for ten guests, it can be rented along with the other Abaca villas to accommodate a family reunion or milestone celebration with friends.

Your holiday at Villa Nyoman includes the services of a villa manager and housekeeper, as well as daily American or Asian breakfast. Bring a book or two to enjoy from the comfort of a lounger in the sun, cool off in the pool and finish the day with dinner from the barbecue. Inside, the villa’s amenities range from a cable TV, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth speaker to a wine fridge.

This luxury property is designed to make the most of Bali’s warm weather, with open-sided living and dining areas. Natural textures like wicker, wood and stone only add to the feeling that the villa is part of the landscape. Although breakfast is included in your stay, there’s also a fully equipped kitchen that makes it easy to prep lunch and dinner.

Villa Nyoman has three bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and open to a private terrace or the pool area.

The Abaca villas are just a short drive from several beaches and temples. If you’re traveling with kids, take them for a day of fun at Waterbom Bali Waterslides; if not, book a round at the Nirwana Bali Golf Course by Greg Norman. For dinner, a spa treatment or a day of shopping, join honeymooners and families alike in Seminyak Square.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Near to beautiful Berawa Beach on the magnificent island of Bali’s southern coast is the four-bedroom Saraswati at Dea. Named after the Hindu goddess of knowledge and art, Villa Saraswati aspires to invoke guests’ curiosity to experience the natural beauty and ancient culture of Bali. The villa can host up to eight lucky guests, all of whom will have the good fortune of being able to experience one of Indonesia’s most famous islands while immersed in both comfort and supreme style.

A team of professional chefs, housekeepers and butlers will be looking after nearly everything so that guests may enjoy themselves. Villa Saraswati offers guests a delightful pétanque court as well as a game of chess with giant fairytale pieces found in the garden. There’s an inviting swimming pool to cool down, and bicycles are also provided for light excursions. The interior of the home boasts a deluxe media room, the latest in surround sound systems, as well as access to Wi-Fi.

The living pavilion is tremendous in size and has the amazing option of remaining walled in, or to have the walls removed and have seamless access to the swimming pool and terrace. This pavilion also hosts the suar-wood dining table that can seat fourteen, surrounded by additional lounge furniture of cushioned wicker sofas and traditional Balinese artworks. Make sure to check out the espresso machine and wine fridge in the stylish open concept modern kitchen.

Saraswati at Dea has four plush en-suite bedrooms, each with dressing areas and access to private gardens. Guests can choose between king size or two twin size beds and can completely relax in their rooms with a television for entertainment. The en-suite bathrooms are alfresco, though walled gardens ensure complete privacy.

The Berawa Beach district has more to offer than just some of the world’s most sought-after surfing locations, it is located near plenty of first-class resorts and restaurants, while being deeply immersed in local culture. Try out the nearby Nirwana Bali Golf Course or visit the Kuta Theater. For a taste of Balinese fine dining, Jalan Kartika Plaza will astound taste buds with rare spices that are hard pressed to be found anywhere else in the world!

Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/get-the-look-balinese-bedroom-ideas/)

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Eight degrees south of the equator on the Indonesian island of Bali, Sati at Dea is a luxury estate whose function is to generously host new and frequent travelers to this magical land. Imbued with a traditional Indonesian architectural style on an immense piece of land, Villa Sati has four charming sleeping quarters that can accommodate up to eight visitors. Located only minutes away from the white sands of Berawa Beach in the south of Bali, guests staying here will have the time of their lives.

Guests staying of Sati at Dea have a full staff to look after them and the estate as well. Inside the main house guests will find the latest televisions, sound systems as well as Wi-Fi. For something a little more inspired, guests can try their hand at the piano or stay in shape in the fitness facility. Outdoors, the lagoon-shaped swimming pool has long been a big crowd pleaser and there’s also an irresistible alfresco dining area with an adjacent barbeque for meals to be enjoyed on the estate’s beautiful grounds.

The estate is comprised of several modern-style joglos, traditional Javanese open air dwellings. This form of indigenous-inspired architecture is accented by native antiques and tribal artifacts that add to the authentic Balinese ambience. Indoors, the dining room features an elegant ten-foot long table. Enjoy food prepared by the chef in a service kitchen hidden behind the well-equipped guest kitchen that features a high-end espresso machine and a fridge full of champagne.

Villa Sati’s bedroom suites are totally private with detached pavilions. One pavilion has a king size bed, while the other three have twin beds that can convert to a king size. The rooms have ample dressing areas, private terraces with daybeds and en-suite alfresco bathrooms made supremely private with walled gardens.

The nearby district of Seminyak boasts pristine beaches, a lively nightlife as well as cultural sites, such as the Pura Petitenget, a Balinese temple that will amaze onlookers with spectacular beachfront ceremonies. Scuba diving is also extremely popular here with master instructors eager to provide lessons and equipment. The south of Bali is also where the most elite spa and massage treatments can be found to soothe sore muscles and make one feel anew. Book your Balinese vacation with Luxury Retreats and emerge relaxed and rejuvenated like never before!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Details big and small—light-filled spaces, sleek paneling, Aesop toiletries—show off Australian design at this enclave of streamlined luxe just outside the Melbourne city center. Glass walls at either end of the home let sunshine pour through the space, and the open-concept living areas seem to spill over into the private courtyard. It’s 10 minutes or less to city sights like Fitzroy Gardens.

After a day out in the city or on the fairways of nearby Burnley Golf Course, pick up fresh fish for the gas barbecue or takeout sushi, then enjoy at the alfresco dining table for 8 in the quiet backyard. Microwave popcorn for a family movie night in a media room with a projector and screen, or let everyone have their own screen time in front of the fireplace and Wi-Fi.

Dove-gray seating, a trompe-l’oeil area rug, and large-scale artwork welcome guests to the formal living room at the front of this luxury property. Follow the espresso-toned wood paneling to the open-concept family room at the back, which has a second sitting area, a dining table for 8, and a fully equipped kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances and a Caesarstone breakfast bar.

This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, a second bedroom with a queen bed, and a third bedroom with 2 twin beds and its own balcony. Neutral-toned bedding gives the bedrooms a serene feel, while modern paintings add color and personality to each suite.

A holiday at this villa puts you steps from downtown Toorak, where you’ll find casual spots and one-of-a-kind shops along with an annual sculpture exhibition. Pick up a cup of coffee—it’s world-class in this part of the world—for the 3-minute walk to the train station and a ride to the museums, public parks, and sporting events that make downtown Melbourne so exciting. Take a day trip to St Kilda Beach for a visit to the penguin colony and honeymoon-worthy stroll along the sand.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This vacation home in Canggu sits on a lush property with plenty of space to relax, making it one of our top Bali villa rentals. Its name translates to “singing river Pangi” and you’ll find several water features, fountains and fishponds throughout the estate. Bali is often called paradise on Earth, and draws visitors for its unique culture, welcoming atmosphere and beautiful beaches.

Unwind with a good book in the traditional balé (relaxation gazebo) then head into the free-form swimming pool for a refreshing dip. There are chaise lounges situated nearby surrounded by lush greenery ensuring you’ll have ultimate privacy. There’s also a Ping-Pong table and a movie collection for evening entertainment.

The living pavilion is open-sided allowing tropical breezes to flow through the space. This area is outfitted with polished teak and terrazzo floors, high-end furnishings, Asian antiques and tropical plants, giving it an ambiance of serenity. The kitchen includes modern appliances, but you won’t have to worry about cooking—there’s a private cook on site, as well as a housekeeper and security guards.

Up to six guests are able to stay in this villa’s three bedrooms, making it an ideal getaway for a small family or group of friends. All rooms have queen size beds, en-suite bathrooms with tubs and showers, air conditioning, and TVs with DVD players, while the master suite boasts a massage table as well as a garden patio for alfresco dining.

This villa is close to the surf and sand—Pererenan Beach is just 2 km away. Golf enthusiasts can hit the challenging greens of Nirwana Bali Golf Club, known as one of the best courses in all of Asia, 8 km from the home, while 10 km brings you to the high-end boutiques, world-class spas and diverse restaurants of Seminyak.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find both inner and outer peace, Bali style, at Abaca Villa Iluh. Though it’s hidden among lush rice fields, it’s close to beaches, temples, shopping, dining and more around Seminyak. The villa’s six bedrooms can welcome up to twelve guests in laid-back luxury, but it can be reserved with the two neighboring Abaca villas for parties of up to 32 friends or extended family.

Your holiday at Villa Iluh includes the services of a villa manager and housekeeper, as well as a choice of American or Asian breakfast each day. Savor the warm weather from a courtyard with a swimming pool and plenty of loungers, and request a gas barbecue if you’d like to do some al-fresco cooking as well. For your evening entertainment, the villa has cable TV, Wi-Fi and a wine fridge.

The villa’s open-sided living and dining areas frame views of the scenery and encourage flow between the indoor and outdoor spaces. Vaulted ceilings covered in woven panels, wicker furnishings and stone floors lend natural texture and relaxed style, and the art collection is an eclectic mix. The villa also has a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar for your lunch and dinner preparations.

Villa Iluh has three bedrooms with king beds, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and open to either a private balcony or the pool area.

Though it’s designed to feel secluded, this vacation rental is just a short drive from some of Bali’s must-sees. It’s an easy trip to several beaches and temples, kid-favorite Waterbom Bali Waterslides and grown-up-favorite Nirwana Bali Golf Course by Greg Norman. Join the honeymooners and families alike flocking to Seminyak Square for boutiques, spas and a range of great eateries.

listing.listing_description:
Escape the city and embrace your wild side at this rugged-chic home set amongst the mountains outlining Lake Wanaka. Sip your morning coffee as the mist settles over the water, hear only the sounds of local wildlife, and bask in the private atmosphere of this secluded landscape. When you feel like emerging from the wilderness, Queenstown is about an hour south of the lake.

Retro California meets luxury ski lodge at villa Aurum. Just like the soaring mountains, Aurum’s great room knows no limits. Inside, wood paneling and rock walls line the spread out kitchen/living/dining area. A full wall of glass opens to the terrace on the lake-side, granting even more hosting space. If you don’t feel like dining indoors, a stylish picnic table on the wood deck is a cozy option. 

Wake up as the sun peeks over the mountain top and start your day with breakfast on the patio. Enjoy the scent of fresh flowers in the garden and the smell of the fire from the night before. Then, walk down to the lake and see if you can catch your lunch. If successful, there’s a barbecue waiting on the deck. After lunch, head inside to rest up with some popcorn and a movie in the media room. 

Close to home, explore the biking/hiking trails leading through the foothills of New Zealand’s Southern Alps and around Lake Wanaka’s misty shores. Hit the slopes of Treble Cone and Cardona, challenging yourself to longest vertical rise in the area.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Leave your worries behind at this tranquil Balinese villa on the northern coast of Kuta. Mature palm trees provide the perfect shady spot to catch up on some reading. If you’re working on a vacation tan, the poolside sunbeds are a great place to stretch out. When you’re ready to explore, start at Tanah Lot, an ancient temple on a rockface in the sea. The view at sunset is incredible.

From the carved entrance to the courtyard lawns, Eshara I loves to show off Bali’s lush natural elements. The open-plan layout is further enhanced by wide terrace doors, furnished exterior lounges, and even an alfresco shower. Inside, the decor has a Bohemian vibe, using an eclectic mix of sculptures, artwork, colorful furnishings, and elegant chandeliers to prove that anything goes, as long as you love it. And, a lot of care has gone into the crafting of Eshara I’s unique atmosphere.

The villa’s full-staff, including a chef, makes it easy to dine-in, but if you feel like checking out the local restaurants, start on Jalan Raya in Seminyak. Dig your feet into the sand while you sip a tropical cocktail at a beachfront bar or head inland for something more formal. Seminyak Beach is also a perfect place to try surfing or take a lesson.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you’re looking for family-friendly luxury accommodations in beautiful Bali, look no further. Situated on top of Jimbaran Hill, a mere fifteen minute drive from the airport, Villa Jamalu has a unique vantage point that reveals the island’s stunning landscape like nowhere else. With four rooms and space for eight, the villa offers plenty of amenities to indulge in for both adults and children. Located near many of Bali’s most sought-after sites and the revered Mount Batukaru, it isn’t hard to see why Bali is the pride of Indonesia.

Villa Jamalu has a comprehensive staff to aid guests in enjoying their time spent here, with a house manager, private chef and housekeeper. Family-friendly means that children will not be given second-billing here. The house contains a playroom full of books and toys as well as a media room with a plasma television and a PS3 gaming console. Additionally, the saltwater swimming pool and billiards table are intended for guests of all ages.

The decor found at Villa Jamalu is contemporary and sleek, composed of leather furnishings, suar wood tables and abstract art. Dine on a grand and elegant dining table which can seat twelve, in a fun and sophisticated setting. The gourmet kitchen features a luxurious double fridge, a separate wine fridge and a coffee machine to brew delicious authentic java.

The guest suites have been designed with stylish, contemporary furnishings and artworks that deliver a familiar sense of comfort. Each room has a queen size bed dressed in chic linens, iPod dock and en-suite bathrooms with charming designer fixtures. The master suite on the top floor has ocean views, whereas the master suite on the ground floor has a jetted tub and view of the pool.

There’s so much to do in Bali, and guests staying at Villa Jamalu can partake in any and all of them at their whim. Try a horseback excursion through scenic trails or get your surf’s up, an activity that Bali is known for throughout the world. A twenty minute drive from the villa will bring you to Uluwatu Temple, which is one of the six holiest sanctuaries in the world according to the Balinese and is built on the edge of a cliff high above the sea. Culture, fine dining and relaxation – get it all with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near the villa. Guests may experience noise, depending on what work is being done at the time. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Dine alfresco amid panoramic vistas of Sydney Harbour Bridge and the iconic Opera House at this contemporary, family-friendly villa in Mosman. Superbly equipped for cooking, dining, and relaxation, Principino (“Little Prince”) offers a cozy and stylish home-base while exploring the Northern Beaches and Australia’s finest city. Play in your private swimming pool or walk minutes to the sands of Dog Beach at Sirius Cove.

The luminous, 3-level home features a main living/dining area on the upper level, bedrooms on the middle floor, and a pool terrace and yoga/play room on the lower floor. The upper level features an open-concept layout with gourmet kitchen and 2 dining areas (indoors and alfresco), with sensational views of the iconic Sydney skyline. These views are on full display in the master and primary guest rooms, too, which share a balcony between them. The ground floor features a beautiful open space with kitchenette that can serve as a rumpus room, yoga studio, or relaxation space. It opens to the outdoor swimming pool with kid-friendly protective fence.

The villa’s prime location is just 2 minutes from Mosman Village and a short trip from several Northern Beaches, including Balmoral and Bondi. Extraordinary native wildlife is on view at Taronga Zoo, while Bungaree’s Walkway will lead you through the local bushland to Georges Head Battery. Just 5 kilometers away is the Sydney Harbour Bridge, your gateway to one of the world’s most exciting cities.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Soham is a spectacular villa on the southern tip of Bali's Bukit Peninsula. One of two luxury villas within the Sohamsa Ocean Estate (along with neighboring Villa Hamsa), this five-bedroom home is perched on a cliff above the waves, with panoramic views of the Indian Ocean. The villa blends contemporary design concepts and high-end amenities with traditional Balinese materials, structures, and artwork, creating an environment at once timeless and utterly comfortable. Resort-like wellness facilities include a massage room, gym, sauna, and steam room, while professional staff include chef services, housekeeping, nighttime security, and a villa manager.

Savor dreamy hours by the ample pool running the length of the house, dipping into its refreshing waters and sunbathing on elegant loungers oriented toward the sea. Relish alfresco meals fresh from the barbeque grill, and gather in the furnished pavilion for sunset cocktails. An interior living and dining room features glass doors opening to the ocean breeze, lending a lovely open-air feel to your dinners and nighttime gatherings.

Each of the five bedroom suites features a king bed (four of which can be converted to pairs of twin beds), an ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, a ceiling fan, and a TV. Both the master suite and the primary guest suite open to the terrace and enjoy stunning ocean views, while their bathrooms include tubs and alfresco showers.

While seemingly poised at the edge of the world, Villa Soham enjoys convenient proximity to some of the finest destinations in southern Bali. You're a few minutes from Pandawa Beach and an easy drive to Nusa Dua and Jimbaran Beach, while golfers are just eleven kilometers from New Kuta Golf. The resort and watersport destination of Tanjung Benoa is less than fourteen kilometers away, as is the iconic Uluwata Sea Temple. Less than eighteen kilometers to Ngurah Rai International Airport, the villa is a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this property has an open plan and privacy between bedrooms may be limited. The downstairs bedroom is separated from the living area by an electric privacy curtain. The upstairs bedroom is a loft style room which overlooks the living area. Please speak with your Villa Specialist for more detail. 

Circle the wrap-around terrace to find the perfect shady spot to sip your morning Espresso while gazing out of forested landscape leading down to Whangagora Harbour at this open concept home in New Zealand. Backyard barbeques, late nights in the hot tub, and alfresco dinners all benefit from the amazing view. After you explore the private trails on-site, head to 90 Mile Beach for a moonlit stroll. 

Open the doors to the terrace and let the warm sun and fresh breeze set a calming tone throughout. The open nature of the villa adds an extra social-element to the space, making it easy to stay part of the conversation even while prepping dinner or relaxing outside. Contemporary furnishings mix with rugged wood and stone features to create an atmosphere that is quintessential New Zealand. 

After dinner, get a fire going, grab a beer, and search the satellite television for some rugby or football. After the game, turn up the sound system, open the terrace doors, and settle in for a late night with good friends. In the morning, get up early and treat everyone to some bacon and eggs at the kitchen’s breakfast bar. 

After a morning round at Kauri Cliffs, a PGA Tour stop, treat yourself to lunch in the Bay of Islands, one of the areas nightlife and entertainment hubs. If you’d rather catch your own meal, head to Whangoroa Harbour and book a private fishing charter. New Zealand is a prime spot for Blue and Striped Marlin. Then, check out Ake Ake Vineyard to sample some of the best local wine. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
